sections.PURPOSE: Increase lethality, survivability, and build proficiency in reconnaissance
sections.KEY TASKS: Develop small unit leader decision making and reconnaissance proficiency. Integrate key enablers & capability (sUAS, AT Systems, SB600). Validate SQDN
